Method Detail

noop

public int noop()
         throws D3Exception
this function do nothing, just send instruction and receive a response. Use it to know the communication is OK
Specified by:
noop in interface D3Session
Returns:
the status of command.
  • D3_OK if the communication is OK
  • D3_ERR if not
